_instructions: 1. Copy this file to slack-config.json 2. Update values below 3. Add SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL to GitHub secrets
_channel_note: Optional: Slack channel to post to (overrides webhook default)
_mentions_note: Optional: Array of Slack user IDs to mention in notifications
_notifyOnDrafts_note: Set to true to send notifications for draft releases
_customMessage_note: Optional: Override default message format. Available variables: {RELEASE_TAG}, {REPO_NAME}, {RELEASE_TYPE}, {AUTHOR}
_actionItems_note: Customize the action items reminder list
